name: WritingInspirations
0:
”Alexa, open Writing Inspirations”
”Alexa, start Writing Inspirations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: writing inspirations
des: Writing Inspirations lets you discover popular quotes on writing. They help you to unlock your creativity and discover the beauty of writing. Quotes are from famous authors such as Ernest Hemingway or Ray Bradbury. Say "Alexa, open writing inspirations" and listen to quotes. Happy writing.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
